name: eggd_additional_regions_calling
title: eggd_additional_regions_calling
summary: This app does variant calling for set regions with low coverage but known variants requiring evaluation

inputSpec.name: input_bam
inputSpec.label: Input BAM file
inputSpec.help: Aligned sequencing data in BAM format. Must be indexed.

inputSpec.name: input_bai
inputSpec.label: BAM Index file
inputSpec.help: Index file for the input BAM.

inputSpec.name: fasta_tar
inputSpec.label: Reference genome fasta and index
inputSpec.help: tar.gz containing genome.fa and genome.fa.fai. Must match reference genome build used.

inputSpec.name: region_list
inputSpec.label: Regions list
inputSpec.help: File containing genomic regions (one per line) or comma-separated list.

inputSpec.name: sentieon_vcf
inputSpec.label: Sentieon HC VCF
inputSpec.help: Sentieon variant calls to be merged. Must be indexed.

inputSpec.name: minimum_read_depth
inputSpec.label: Threshold to define read depth and only call variants if exceeds minimum threshold

outputSpec.name: output_vcf
outputSpec.label: Output VCF file
outputSpec.help: Final variant calls merged with Sentieon HC VCF.

outputSpec.name: output_vcf_index
outputSpec.label: Output VCF index file
outputSpec.help: Index file for the output VCF.
